data.question: What is the empirical formula of Cu-I-bpyc?
What is the crystal system of Cu-Br-bpyc?
At what temperature were the crystals of Cu-I-bpyc and Cu-Br-bpyc analyzed?
data.answer: 170 K for Cu-I-bpyc and 220.0 K for Cu-Br-bpyc

data.question: What is the space group of Cu-Cl-bpyc?
What method was used for the EPR detection of the superoxide radical?
data.answer: EPR detection was conducted in the presence of DMPO.

data.question: What was the yield percentage of Cu-Cl-bpyc based on ligands bpyc?
What was the purpose of using the SQUEEZE subroutine in PLATON during the structural refinement of Cu-X-bpyc?
data.answer: The SQUEEZE subroutine in PLATON was used to handle disordered solvent regions in the crystal structure.

data.question: True or False: The Cu-Cl-bpyc coordination polymer was tested for photocatalytic oxidation of C(sp3)−H bonds.
What was the main finding from the chlorine radical trapping experiments with styrene?
data.answer: The experiments were designed to support the hypothesis of the importance of chlorine radicals in the C–H functionalization of hydrocarbons.

data.question: True or False: The Cu-Cl-bpyc catalyst was reused at least five times without a remarkable decrease in reactivity.
What was the role of NH4Cl in the catalytic oxidation of C-H bond of phthalan?
data.answer: NH4Cl was used to possibly substitute other halide anions coordinated initially, improving the catalytic performances of Cu-Br-bpyc and Cu-I-bpyc.

data.question: True or False: The Cu-Cl-bpyc coordination polymer exhibits a lamellar structure.
What was the effect of adding different amounts of NH4Cl to the model experiment for tetrahydrofuran oxidation?
data.answer: The reaction efficiency was the best when 0.5 equiv of NH4Cl was added, increasing the yield to 63% for Cu-Br-bpyc.

data.question: True or False: The Cu-Cl-bpyc catalyst was characterized by SEM and elemental mapping.
What was the purpose of the SEM images and elemental mapping for Cu-X-bpyc polymers?
data.answer: The SEM images and elemental mapping were used to provide a homogeneous distribution of the elements over the entire structures, implying the integration of halogen into the coordination polymers.

data.question: True or False: The Cu-Cl-bpyc catalyst demonstrated the ability to activate O2 and oxidize the C(sp3)−H bond without any additional co-catalyst.
What was the significance of the PXRD patterns tests conducted on Cu-Cl-bpyc before and after catalysis?
data.answer: The PXRD patterns tests were conducted to confirm the structural integrity of Cu-Cl-bpyc after being reused for multiple catalytic cycles.

data.question: True or False: The Cu-Cl-bpyc catalyst was impregnated in acetonitrile solution containing tetrahydrofuran to confirm substrate loading.
What was the outcome of the substrate encapsulation experiments conducted on Cu-Cl-bpyc?
data.answer: The substrate-loaded crystals were confirmed by using IR spectroscopy, showing characteristic peaks of the tetrahydrofuran.

data.question: True or False: DFT calculations were performed to understand the enzymatic activation processes of tetrahydrofuran on Cu-Cl-bpyc.
